title: I love WhatsApp
text: I live in the USA and on a Caribbean island. Having WhatsApp allows me to keep in touch with dear friends and family, plus I’m able to do business stuff as well, easily. Thanks WhatsApp!

title: Archive a group
text: I love having “inbox zero” but I cannot archive a group from the chats tab. Please allow us to archive groups.

title: Need to modify voice and video calk function
text: Excellent app. Have reduced one star mainly because the voice and video call buttons need to be modified to ensure calls are not placed in error. It has happened frequently for me and my friends. It should have a 2 tap function to enable these calls. The first tap should initiate a popup with a query if you really want to make this call. The second tap would initiate the call.

title: Meta's latest Self-Mutilation
text:
Way to go geniuses. New name for your latest butchery: WTFAppWhatsApp

After the alleged "update" it crrashes immediately after loading chats on my MBP 15" Retina. Within minutes of the update, WhatsApp went from being one of my most essential apps to being wasted disk space. Tossing cache, resetting parameters on my system, etc, etc. Everything else works as always except the now defunct WhatsApp. Now am relying on Skype .

title: Great App but could use improvement
text: The app has come a long way. There seem to be bugs whenever I have changed phones, I have lost all my messages and voice notes. I was told this isn’t a phone setting issue but more of a WhatsApp issue. Also, if you could add the feature to translate messages like iMessage does, this would be a game changer.

title: Backup overwriting

title: Duplicate photos
text:
On my iPhone my WhatsApp is set to automatically save the photos I receive on Photos. For me this was working just fine, but a couple of days ago Photos started to save each photo twice. This means that now, if I receive one photo via WhatsApp and then I go to Photos, the same pic appears duplicated.
I've been searching settings on my phone to try to fix this with no luck, I've been looking for it also through the internet but I cannot find the solution. I also tried turning off the "save in Photos" setting, then turning off my phone and then turning "save in Photos" back on but didn't work either.
I'll appreciate any help you can give me.
Thank you! 🔆

title: It logged me out

My friend I didn’t do anything, I just message with my friends and family and that’s it, like if you can check what’s the problem I will appreciated.

title: Extremely Buggy
text: I love this app and use it daily, it’s become incredibly buggy for me though. I use it on multiple devices, iPhone 15 pro with an up to date OS has all the issues. The older iPhone 12 works flawlessly every time. This has been going on for close to 6 months, it’s unacceptable and warrants a poor rating now. I’ll be changing the rating upon bugs being fixed.
